name: 2020 ICBASS @ Osaka: Energy and Sustainability
content: 2020 International Conference on Business and Social Science takes great pleasure in welcoming you to Osaka, Japan under the theme "Energy and Sustainable Development." 2020 ICBASS looks for significant contributions to related researches in theoretical and practical aspects. Authors are sincerely invited to submit articles related to the following areas, but are not limited to: -Alternative Energy -Ecotourism -Energy Efficiency -Energy and Environmental Policy -Life Science, Environmental and Climate Science -Renewable Energy and Smart Energy Systems -Sustainable Development -Sustainability and Social Responsibility -Principles of Sustainable Development -Sustainable Environmental Preservation and Management -Sustainable Strategies for Developing Countries -The Challenge of Sustainability -Communication -Culture -Economics -Education -Finance -Law -Management -Politics -Psychology -Social Sciences
